User - Class in com.openclassrooms.paymybuddy.model
Model Class of a user with credentials such as email and password and personal information, firstname, lastname, list of bank accounts and list of connections with other users.

UserDeletionObserver - Interface in com.openclassrooms.paymybuddy.service
Interface Class to implement observer pattern on user deletion to clean up bank transfers and transactions involving the user to delete.
